Rulings.Edison:
●You can Special Summon a high-level Normal Monster with The Thing in the Crater's effect, but not a Special Summon-only monster.
●The Thing in the Crater's effect activates even if destroyed face-down and sent to the GY.
●When you have a monster equipped with Metalsilver Armor, your opponent can activate The Thing in the Crater's effect because it doesn't target.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can Special Summon a high-level Normal Monster with the effect of "The Thing in the Crater", but not a 'Special Summon-only' monster.\n2. The effect of "The Thing in the Crater" activates even if destroyed face-down and sent to the GY.\n3. When you have a monster equipped with "Metalsilver Armor", your opponent can activate the effect of "The Thing in the Crater" because it doesn't target.
